storyInfo: Arturia escapes her captivity in Landen Monastery, and Federico gives chase. Meanwhile, Exusiai decides to infiltrate the Shrine of Nurtury by blending in with the refugees.

attributes.content: 'The Ends of the Earth' lounge, Lungmen
What are you doing here, Exusiai?
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: Uh, what are YOU doing here?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: The lounge's closed.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I just ended up here. Not sure how. An indentured employee's instincts, I suppose.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: Thought I might as well clean up, so long as I'm here.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: Oh, I'll clean that up!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I saw that they were gifts for me, so I opened them.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: A crystal ball? This must be Bisonâ€”wait, MountainDash Logistics has already expanded into Skarphaket?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What is this whole stack of coupon vouchers? 'The more ya buy, the more ya save; the more ya save, the more ya buy'... does Croissant want me to clean out the mall?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Sora's Siracusan Tour Live Album 'A Chance Encounter'... did she forget to send a couple of tickets?
attributes.name: Exusiai
Exusiai
attributes.content: Carnevale mask. This one's got to be from Texas...

attributes.name: Exusiai
attributes.content: It's a little tight. Not great.
attributes.joined: Carnevale mask. This one's got to be from Texas...It's a little tight. Not great.

attributes.name: Exusiai
attributes.content: This brush...

attributes.name: Exusiai
attributes.content: Is it a gift from the boss, or does he want me to use it to clean his vinyls for him?
attributes.joined: This brush...Is it a gift from the boss, or does he want me to use it to clean his vinyls for him?

attributes.content: Hey, Yith, what kind of hair do you think the brush is made from?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Looks Lupo to me.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: Say, why are boss and Texas still in Nuova Volsinii when the Carnevale's already over? I got back from Sargon only to find the shop totally empty! Not a soul in sight!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Texas said she was setting up Penguin Logistics operations over there. As for Emperor...
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: He and his friends have some other matters to attend to... matters besides recording sessions, parties, and employee training.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: Gotcha. Well, I guess it's all the same if I report to you.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: Give me a sec. I'm almost done filling it out.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Filling what out?
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: My leave request!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I want to take a really long break, so I figured I should go through the formal procedures!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Exusiai?
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: You know why I took the Sargonian job, right?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Sargon... Mostima was assigned to the area as Legatus, wasn't she?
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: Bingo!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Mostima told me that the one who did those things to sis and her is back in Laterano, the one sis hoped would never show his face again...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: She hasn't fully recovered, but she's joined the Curia. Truth or secret, the events of the past have once again brought them together...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: The things that I came to Lungmen to find out.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You're going back to Laterano?
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: Of course! Can't very well wait for my sis to come and see me.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Texas, Sora, Bison, Croissant... even the boss, of all people, are busy right now. All good things must come to an end, as they say.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Never forget your rootsâ€”that's Penguin Logistics corporate culture, isn't it?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: On display every day... but correct, in principle.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: Keep these gifts safe for me. Tell my friends that I'll be back, once everything is taken care of.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Is that your ride?
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: What? No way! I only just decided!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Exusiai.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Uh, hi, guys... what's up?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: This just arrived at the office.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Classified files from landship?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I'm exhausted.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I came all this way, only to get caught up in one strange thing after another! My head's spinning.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.text: 'Good work, but we need to move quicker.'
'Without a second thought, the Curia is treating the explosion as a terror attack targeting the Summit of Nations.'

attributes.content: Who would have thought that a harmless confessional would be a top-notch spy?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Good work. I'll give you a pat on your speakers.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.text: 'Which is to say, you are a wanted fugitive now.'

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: With Vani's help, though, our bombs can now snap three pillars with one blast!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: There's a long way to go, but pick the right pillar, and a bomb like this can topple an entire building!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.text: 'The shrine is bigger than any building that exists on Terra. You must familiarize yourself with its layout.'

attributes.content: I don't suppose they'll let me in if I say I'm a fervent believer who wants to pay daily respects to it.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.text: 'The shrine is heavily guarded. Even confessionals cannot easily enter.'

attributes.content: No big deal!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: If there's a problem, find a solution! If there's no problem, make a problem!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: 'Never take a boring order'â€”that's Penguin Logistics corporate culture!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.text: 'Your passion and perseverance are extraordinary, but you have a hard time hiding your thoughts. You should not disturb those you know before it is time, even if...'

attributes.content: Even if it's my sister, right?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: That only motivates me more. I'll solve this problem, if for no other reason than to see my sis sooner!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It's time to go, El.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: I know, Vani.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I've only met her a couple of times, but when it comes to this, I know I can trust her.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I can already guess what you're worried about, but... well, it's hard to explain the connection between Sanktas. Anyway, no need to worry.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.text: 'In that case, this confession has come to a close. Have a nice day.'

attributes.content: Why do comfort bells keep ringing?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: It's the two nurseries up ahead... strange. There should be other Nurturers in charge of them...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: â€”Ugh!
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The giant milk bottles on each side of the corridor suddenly fall, knocking Andoain out cold.
Situation?
attributes.name: Intruder A

attributes.content: He's unconscious, but alive.
attributes.name: Intruder B

attributes.content: What kind of baby would need a milk bottle this big? It's heavy enough to give a full-grown burdenbeast a concussion.
attributes.name: Intruder B

attributes.content: Anyway, it's for the best. Less commotion this way.
attributes.name: Intruder A

attributes.content: What do we do next? Do we peek inside, or...?
attributes.name: Intruder B

attributes.content: This is a strange place...
attributes.name: Intruder A

attributes.content: You carry him. The rest of you, stay on your guard. We're getting out of this bloody place the way we came in.
attributes.name: Intruder A

attributes.content: Leader's waiting outside. We'll get this guy to answer our questions once he wakes up.
attributes.name: Intruder A

attributes.content: Gotchaâ€”
attributes.name: Intruder B

attributes.content: Like a wind from nowhere, the comfort bells that hang quietly in the corridor and nurseries suddenly begin ringing.
It is not a sound to put babies to sleep; it is cacophonous, unceasing, a loud alarm.
Damnâ€”
attributes.name: Intruder A

attributes.content: Alert cancelled.
attributes.name: Shrine Patrol

attributes.content: Clean up the scene. Don't let the children see it. Take Nurturer Andoain to his room.
attributes.name: Shrine Patrol

attributes.content: Andoain! You're awake.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: What happened?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Intruders. But the guards caught them.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: Looks like your hunch was right. You were being followed.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: They were after me?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: You're the chosen Nurturer. They must have the Nativity in their sights.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: Who are the intruders?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Just some wayward souls.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: Wayward... souls?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What I mean is, I don't know who they are. Our siblings will pick up the investigation.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: You know better than anyone else how important the Nativity is.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: Stay safe and enjoy some rest.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: Were you frightened?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: (Pants anxiously)
Lean against my arm.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: No need to fear. It's the comfort bells. You will not hear those terrible sounds here...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: No hunter's whistles, no roaring of tuskbeasts, no rumbling of Originium tides.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: (Moans weakly)
I'm here. I'm always here.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I can feel how much you want to keep living with this life within you... as do I.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Soon, soon... everyone will hope for the same. There will be no more fighting, no more conflict. Everyone will join together in Paradise.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Everyone will walk together with you.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What do you mean, she just vanished without a trace?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: We had just cut the wheat. I had everyone take a little break after lunch. She said she wanted to play her cello, and I-I let her...
attributes.name: Panicked Nun

attributes.content: She came to this leeward ridge, not too far away. We could hear her music all this time, so I-I didn't think too much of it.
attributes.name: Panicked Nun

attributes.content: Then, when you came to find her, she was nowhere to be seen...
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: What is this? Some kind of paranormal activity?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Paranormal activity... right at the door of a monastery...
attributes.name: Panicked Nun

attributes.content: It would make a nice movie... what I mean is, no need to panic.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: You can still hear the music, can't you? Perhaps Arturia just went deeper into the wheat fields. Musicians can be an unpredictable lot.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Take some and go up front. I'll handle things here.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Examine the other scarecrows, Sister. You should find a device like this on their necks.
Who are you?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Executor Federico of the Notarial Hall. I came for my regular visit of the prisoner Arturia.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The young executor opens his palm. There is a paper dragonfly sitting on it, flapping its wings at a regular frequency to create pleasant music.
P-Paper dragonfly?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: A form of musical Arts. The prisoner must have learned it in Leithanien.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Sh-She used a page from The Saints' Travels!
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: This detail is not important. What is important is I am now certain that Arturia is no longer under observation. She has escaped.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I... I surmised as much.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Arturia is an important individual, is she not?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Based on the amount of resources that the Notarial Hall has committed, from issuing a warrant to achieving her apprehensionâ€”yes.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: L-Landen Monastery has only recently regained its standing with the Curia and gotten out of the red...
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: (And this executor caught us on the spot! There's no way we can quietly bring Arturia back now...)
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I can hear you, Sister.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: A-Anyway, I must report this to the Curia immediately!
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: There will be no need for that, Sister.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The Notarial Hall will take over from here. I was the one who apprehended Arturia; I will catch her before she can do any true harm.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: There will be no need for Landen Monastery to file a report.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Th-That's not what the procedures say, is it?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I see... you never intended to report this, did you?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: This is an awfully convenient coincidence. You came for this. You knew Arturia would escape.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: No comment.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Arturia was just like you. It was like she had realized something, and spoke in cryptic terms...
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: If you won't let me report this, senior, then I must join you in your pursuit of Arturia.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Landen Monastery is very important to me. I won't let it come to harm.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: The executor flicks deftly with his finger, and the paper dragonfly turns back into a creased page. The music disappears, and the fields are once again quiet.
What are you doing?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Retaining evidence. The sound it was making would have obstructed our investigation.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Your request complies with the regulations of the Executor's Handbook. I hereby approve the request to join the hunt for the fugitive. Come.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You're just as strange as Arturia, only in a much different way.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I've seen it standing there like that every day, but when you get up close...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: HOW IS IT SO CRAZY TALL?!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What are these gill-like scales... where do these bone-like passages lead...?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: And what's with this flowing color on the wall? It's like what you throw up after you eat blueberry pudding made with soup water... I'm getting sick just looking at it.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: How do you know what you throw up after eating blueberry pudding made with soup water?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Just a little practical joke that didn't go the way I intended. Not the most pleasant of memories, but it almost brings a smile, thinking back to it now.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Back then, we could tell the difference between a practical joke and serious stuff, and we didn't build strange structures like this with true blue religious fervor. What even is it, anyway? Some kind of massive biological organ?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: This place feels familiar. I must have been here before, but I can't tell whether it used to be a bakery, a chapel, or a munitions market.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: It's like this huge shrine has always been here.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: It feels... weird...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Does your head hurt?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It's not that hard to understand.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Imagine your favorite patisserie, which you visit once every few days, whether it's for a party, or just because your sweet tooth is aching.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: When you happen to pass by it today, you can't resist.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: But when you bite into the mille-feuille you just bought, everything feels different. You wonder if they got a new patissier, then you look up and find the whole storefront is different.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It's pretty much just like that, right?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Y-Yeah... wow, I couldn't put my feelings into words like that at all.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: But when did that mille-feuille become different?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: No idea! It seems to have changed when I got back from Lungmen.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I saw the shrine standing there as soon as I came out of the port.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Say, how did I miss something this big from outside the city?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Shhâ€”Elâ€”
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Over there...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: All patrols, form up.
attributes.name: Shrine Patrol A

attributes.content: Guard these halls in three-team squads. Shifts change every three hours.
attributes.name: Shrine Patrol A

attributes.content: We must not allow any further intrusions into the shrine, no attacks on the Nurturers.
attributes.name: Shrine Patrol A

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Shrine Patrol B

attributes.content: Since when did the Pontifica Cohors Lateran wear such... distinctive uniforms?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Wait, this scaley cape... are these guards just for the Shrine of Nurtury?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: There are too many of them... not sure how to get past. They've blocked off all the paths.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What do we do?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: We're here.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: Is this the place where Extra's resting?
attributes.name: Sarkaz

attributes.content: Yes. We can arrange for visits, if you so desire.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: Dedicated Nurturers have been assigned to her. She will receive the best possible care until she gives birth.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: What about us?
attributes.name: Feline

attributes.content: Thirteen nomadic abbeys, with patients in the four figures. The Pagus Ambrosius you put us in doesn't have that many hospitals or sanatoriums...
attributes.name: Feline

attributes.content: The Summit of Nations, with all its attendees, has stretched Laterano's medical resources to its limits.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: So...
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: Taking in a pregnant woman already represents exceptional circumstances.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: However, you have come here out of trust in Laterano, and Laterano must repay that trust.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: The Shrine of Nurtury is not scheduled to open to the public until after the Nativity. Most of the rooms are unoccupied at this time, and our Nurturers have received basic medical training.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: The Matriarch has already discussed this with the Curia. The Shrine of Nurtury will take in our friends from outside on a temporary basis, until more permanent arrangements can be made.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: The guards will escort you to your rooms. I must remain here, as more patients are expected to arrive.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: The Lord's blessing be upon Laterano, and upon all.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: See, there's a way.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Don't tell meâ€”
attributes.name: Vannini
